page.title: 07GIRLS FASHION PART 1
page.content: Fashion involves all sorts of things like,Pop stars,Pop groups,Crazes and Clothes.We asked all the girls in classes 5 and 6 four questions each to see what fashions they liked best.Here are our results: 1.How many girls like boys fashion better than girls,or both? Ans:=We found out that girls like both fashions equally. 2.We asked the girls what was their favourite Pop group or Pop stars? Ans:=The favourites were Paul Young, Wham and Duran Duran. 3.We asked the girls what television programmes they like best? Ans:=The favourites were Top Of The Pops,Fame,Saturday Superstore,Dallas and EastEnders. 4.We wanted to find out what crazes were going round the school.
